data.title: Hearing Locations & Contacts

data.text:
FINRA offers 69 hearing venues, including at least one in each state of the United States and one in San Juan, Puerto Rico and Washington, DC. The map below indicates the hearing locations and the Dispute Resolution Services regional office that administers cases for those locations. Depending on caseload demands, Dispute Resolution Services may assign cases in certain hearing locations to a different regional office.

On This Page

Northeast Regional Office

Midwest Regional Office

Southeast Regional Office

Western Regional Office

FINRA Dispute Resolution Services (DRS) Senior Leadership

Effective August 2, 2021, all FINRA hearing locations are open for in-person proceedings. FINRA is committed to taking measures to ensure each hearing location is safe for the hearing participants. Please take a moment to review our Safety Protocols for In-Person Hearings.

Equipment and other services vary by location. Please contact your Case Administrator at least one week before the evidentiary hearing to see what equipment and services are available.

Based on the advice of the U.S. Postal Inspection Service, FINRA no longer opens or accepts letters or packages lacking senders' names and return addresses. Please be sure when sending mail to FINRA that your name and return address are clearly legible.

Northeast Regional Office

FINRA Dispute Resolution Services

Brookfield Place

200 Liberty Street

New York, NY 10281

(212) 858-4200 (Monday – Friday, 9–5 ET)

Email

Our New York City office administers hearings held in the following cities:
